Use Einstein Article Recommendations in the Lightning Service Console to find and attach relevant articles to cases.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions. 

Einstein shows up to five relevant articles at a time, sorted by relevance. Each article's relevance is refreshed when:

* A case is created
* A field included in your Einstein Article Recommendations model is updated on a case

To attach or edit a recommended article, select Attach Article or Edit as Draft from the dropdown menu. Marking an article as not helpful indicates it's not relevant to the case and helps Einstein make better recommendations next time.
title: Using Einstein Article Recommendations in Service Cloud
